Articles.Content:
A very simple game. And this time it is really simple. Like, for real.

This game is just about posting a situation (any situations!) and the next poster channel their inner Jeb and imagine what Jeb would do in that situation.

Example:

First poster:

What would Jeb do if he got stuck on the mun?

Next poster:

Fly home using only EVA jetpack and land safely on his helmet!

What would Jeb do if he meet the Kraken?

And so on. Go crazy!

Let us start!

What would Jeb do if he forgot his helmet before going out on EVA?

Edited February 24, 2015 by RainDreamer

Epicly burn up in the atmosphere.

Jeb is trapped in a plane with a fire in the cockpit.

Jeb lands the plane.

What would Jeb do if he was in the wrong seat?

Push the kerbal occupying his seat out the airlock. (It's ok, he'll land safely on his helmet)

What would Jeb do if he were being pushed out an airlock?

take the Kerbal pushing him with him.

What would jeb do if his lander's engines failed during the last braking burn (harder...on Duna)?

Land the spacecraft on its helmet!

What would Jeb do if someone ate all the snacks in the universe?

murder them and steal the snacks back

what would jeb do iuf he was going to be replaced

Find who is to replace him. Stab him/her with an SRB. Continue on with career.

Jeb is stuck in High Tylo Orbit, no RCS fuel, and has lost signal to mission control and all other spacecraft. He has 5 hours of Oksygen (Kerbal Oxygen) left. How will he get out of this? Find out next post on "What Would Jebediah Kerman Do?"

Download hyper edit and land on kerbin

jeb is stuck in jool

sacrifice bob

jeb is locked in a room with danny

Kill Danny and make a rocket out of dead danny and fly out

jebs stuck inside a kraken inside a kraken inside a kraken

Edited February 26, 2015 by Ethanadams

Jeb would simply walk out their mouths.

Jeb dies. What would he do?

Shrug it off.

Jeb is told to strategically think about his actions more often. His response is obviously to...

Strategically do it like a boss.

Jeb fails his flying test. What does he do?

Fly anyway.

Jeb meets Chuck Norris. What would Jeb Do?

Stab him?

What would jeb do if 3.14% of all kerbals are PIrates??

Become a pirate.

What if Jeb came to our solar system?

He would be the first on pluto.

Jeb is Jeb. What would jeb do?

Be Jeb

Jeb's lander went into Eve's ocean. What would jeb do?
